description:
bookMarked - Manage your favorite webpages with ease!

- Home Page
- Categorized bookmarks
- Web view Tabs

This app was designed for those who like to have quick and easy access to their favorite websites.

Open up to 4 web views without leaving the app! Simply toggle a button to switch views!

When you visit a website, or while you're just browsing the internet, simply tap a button to create a bookmark which can then be placed into the category of your choice! 

Managing your bookmarks is super easy! Swipe to delete your bookmarks or entire categories. You can even rename your bookmarks/categories simply by holding down on the name.

Download bookMarked today and receive free updates with new features and support with all future updates.

*This app is not intended to replace the default web browser. It's just better and easier!
versionNote: Now Includes Tabs! - Open up to 4 web views without leaving the app! Simply toggle a button to switch views!
